Data compiled from a series of participatory ocean use mapping workshops held in 2010 and 2011.  Data provide use patterns showing general use areas and dominant use or hotspot areas.]]></Abstract>     <KeywordList><Keyword><![CDATA[Oceans, Marine, National, Renewable energy, offshore, NOAA OCM, BOEM]]></Keyword></KeywordList>     <OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:type="simple" <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Title><![CDATA[Extractive/Fishing Uses]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[These layers show general use and dominant use patterns for eleven separate extractive/fishing ocean uses documented as part of the Hawaii and West Maui Coastal Uses Mapping projects. The uses include: Aquarium Collecting, Bait Netting, Dive Fishing, Gill Nets, Spearfishing, Throw Nets, Net Fishing from a Boat, Net Fishing from Shore, Pole and Line Fishing from a Boat, Pole and Line Fishing from Shore and Shore-based Gathering.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>1</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Shore-based Gathering]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes Shoreline gathering of (most) invertebrates and limu; excludes Harvesting lobsters or diving on the reef.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>1</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=1" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>2</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Shore-based Pole and Hand Line Fishing]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes shore-based dunking, whipping, bamboo, and fly fishing activities (both commercial and non-commercial operations); excludes pole and line fishing from a boat.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>2</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=2" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>3</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Boat-based Pole and Hand Line Fishing]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes boat-based bottom fishing, trolling, pole and line, and handlining (both commercial and non-commercial operations); excludes pole and line fishing from shore.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>3</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=3" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>4</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Shore-based Net Fishing]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Net fishing from shore or nearshore includes lay net, cross net, barricade net, surround net; excludes aquarium collection, throw net, bait netting, boat-based net fishing, net fishing >5 ft deep.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>4</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=4" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>5</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Boat-based Net Fishing]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes surround net, \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdpelu net, bag net, Kona crab net, and lobster net; excludes throw nets and gill nets.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>5</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=5" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>6</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Throw Nets]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes any type of throw net; excludes aquarium collection, \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdpelu /akule fishing, and gill or lay nets.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>6</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=6" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>7</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Spearfishing]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes freediving and SCUBA in-water use of spear (gun, 3-prong); excludes shoreline gathering with a spear.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>7</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=7" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>8</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Gill Nets]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes fishing using gill net, cross net, barricade net, lay net and drift net; excludes aquarium collection, surround net or throw net fishing.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>8</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=8" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>9</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Dive Fishing]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Free diving and SCUBA-based harvesting includes In water use of spear (gun, 3-prong)for fish and octopus (he\ufffd\ufffd\ufffde); hand gathering of lobster (ula) and shells (pupu) >5 foot deep; excludes shoreline/intertidal gathering, lobster net.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>9</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=9" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>10</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Bait Netting]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Bait netting includes net fishing for bait fishes from shore, net fishing for bait fishes from boats, (nehu); excludes aquarium collection, other types of net fishing targeting fish for non-bait purposes.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>10</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=10" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>11</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Aquarium Collecting]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Aquarium collecting includes all gear types to collect fish and invertebrates for aquarium purposes, as well as shrimp to feed tropical fish; and excludes collection for species to be eaten and/or sold as food.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>11</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=11" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>12</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Extractive Dominant Use Summary]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[A heat map showing the number of overlapping dominant use areas for all extractive uses mapped as part of the Hawaii and West Maui Coastal Uses Mapping projects.  The uses include: Aquarium Collecting, Shoreline Gathering, Bait Netting, Gill Nets, Net Fishing from a Boat, Net Fishing from Shore, Free Diving and SCUBA-based Harvesting, Non-Motorized, Pole and Line Fishing from a Boat, Pole and Line Fishing from Shore, Spearfishing, and Throw Nets.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>12</Title>           <LegendURL width="22" height="96">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=12" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Title><![CDATA[Non-Consumptive Uses]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[These layers show general use and dominant use patterns for eight separate non-consumptive/recreational ocean uses documented as part of the Hawaii and West Maui Coastal Uses Mapping projects.    The uses include: Camping, Surfing, Swimming, Commercial Boating and Mammal Watching, Recreational Non-Motorized Boating, Commercial Diving and Snorkeling, Recreational Diving and Snorkeling and Thrill Craft and High-Speed Activities.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>14</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Thrill Craft and High-Speed Activities]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes parasailing tours, use of jet boats, jet skis, motorized kayaks, and coastal off-roading; excludes non-motorized vessels.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>14</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=14" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>15</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Recreational Diving and Snorkeling]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes shore-based and vessel-based SCUBA, snorkel, and free-diving activities that are not for the purpose of fishing or gathering; excludes research, spearfishing, extractive activities, trolling, or commercial activities.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>15</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=15" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>16</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Commercial Diving and Snorkeling]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes diving and snorkeling activities organized through a commercial operator, including vessel and shore-based SCUBA, SNUBA, snorkel, freediving, and kayak snorkel tours, including rentals; excludes swimming, speardiving or extractive activities, and non-commercial diving and snorkeling.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>16</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=16" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>17</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Recreational Non-Motorized Boating]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes outrigger canoe paddling (individual or team), racing, paddle-driven kayaking, kayak-based snorkeling or freediving, and flatwater stand-up paddleboarding (SUP); excludes commercial boating activities, use of motorized vessels, and surf-style SUP.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>17</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=17" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>18</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Commercial Boating and Mammal Watching]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes dolphin tours, whale-watching tours, scenic tours, and bare boat rentals; excludes non-commercial activities.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>18</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=18" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>19</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Swimming]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes racing, general exercise, and triathlons (individual or team); excludes freediving, snorkeling, or wading.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>19</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=19" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>20</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Surfing]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes surfing, surf-style SUP, windsurfing, kite surfing, and boogie-boarding; excludes flatwater SUP.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>20</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=20" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>21</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Camping]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Includes all overnight camping for fishing or recreational purposes, as well as homeless encampments, whether permitted or non-permitted; excludes fishing-focused overnight use.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>21</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=21" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>22</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Non-Consumptive Dominant Use Summary]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[A heat map showing the number of overlapping dominant use areas for all non-consumptive uses mapped as part of the Hawaii and West Maui Coastal Uses Mapping projects.    The uses include: Camping, Commerical Diving and Snorkeling, Commericial/Motorized Boating and Mammal Watching, Non-Charter/Non-motorized Boating, Recreational Diving and Snorkeling, Surfing, Swimming, and Thrill Craft and High-Speed Activities.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>22</Title>           <LegendURL width="22" height="112">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=22" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>23</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Dominant Ocean Use Summary]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[A heat map showing the number of overlapping dominant use areas for all uses mapped as part of the Hawaii Coastal Uses Mapping project.  For Hawaii this includes eight non-consumptive/recreational uses and eight extractive/fishing uses.  For West Maui this includes nine non-consumptive/recreational uses and nine extractive/fishing uses.    The uses include: Aquarium Collecting, Camping, Charter Boating and Mammal Watching, Charter Diving and Snorkeling, Shoreline Gathering, Bait Netting, Gill Nets, Net Fishing from a Boat, Net Fishing from Shore, Free Diving and SCUBA-based Harvesting, Non-Charter Diving and Snorkeling, Non-Motorized, Non-Charter Boating, Pole and Line Fishing from a Boat, Pole and Line Fishing from Shore, Spearfishing, Surfing, Swimming, Thrill Craft and High-Speed Activities, and Throw Nets.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-156.750736</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-155.821544</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>19.770840</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>21.058597</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-156.750736" miny="19.770840" maxx="-155.821544" maxy="21.058597"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="19.770840" miny="-156.750736" maxx="21.058597" maxy="-155.821544"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-17449412.116300" miny="2245903.476700" maxx="-17345974.892800" maxy="2398867.025300"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>23</Title>           <LegendURL width="28" height="176">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/HawaiiWestMauiOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=23" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>     </Layer>   </Capability> </WMS_Capabilities>
